You can run BLAST to align your own sequences against the **OomyceteDB** *rps10* database here.
This BLAST will be run on our servers and we have limited resources.
For large or numerous BLAST runs, we suggest you download the database and run blast locally.

For example, you could blast the following sequences:

```
>MG701922.1 (Ph. cactorum)
GAAAATCTTTGTGTCGGTGGTTCAAATCCACCTCCAGACAATTTTTATTATTAAAAATATGTATCTTTTAAGAATAACTTTTAAATCCTTTCAAAAAATAAATCAACTTAAACAGAATTTATTAAAATTAAAAAAAATTA
ATAAATTAAAAAATATTCAAATACAAGGAATATTTCAAACAAAAAATAAAAATAAAATTTTTACTCTATTAAAATCTCCACATGTAAATAAAAAAGCACGTGAACATTTTATAATTAAAAATTATACACCAAAAATTGAT
ATAAAATTTAAAAATTTTTTTCAATTATTAAATTTTTTAATTTTAATTAAAAAAATTTTATCAGAAAATACATTAACAAATATTAAAATTTTAAAAAAAAATTAAAATTATGCTTATAGCTTAATTGGATAAAGCATTAG
ATTGCGGATCTATAAAATGAAAGTTCGAGTCTTTCTAAGCATATATTTTATTTTGAAGTATAGCCAAGTGGTAAGGCCTCCGTTTTTGGTACGGAAAATCAAAGGTTCGAATCCTTTTACTTCAAAGGGCCTATA
```
